entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
